solution_line_template: Alex gives his friends a total of {num_friends} friends * {silk_per_friend} meters of silk = <<{num_friends}*{silk_per_friend}={total_silk_given}>>{total_silk_given} meters of silk.
This means he has {initial_silk} - {total_silk_given} = <<{initial_silk}-{total_silk_given}={silk_left}>>{silk_left} meters of silk left in storage.
He can therefore make {silk_left} meters of silk / {silk_per_dress} meters of silk per dress = <<{silk_left}/{silk_per_dress}={dresses_alex_can_make}>>{dresses_alex_can_make} dresses.
